mapper.select: SELECT B.INSP_ITEM_SEQ ,A.PURNO ,A.RQSTNO ,A.PRODNO ,#{sAssetYn} ASSET_YN ,B.ASSET_TYPE_CD ,FN_GET_CMMNCODENAME('COM007', B.ASSET_TYPE_CD) ASSET_TYPE_NAME ,B.ITEM_CD ,B.ITEM_NAME ,B.ZEUS_ITEM_CD ,B.ZEUS_ITEM_NAME ,(CASE WHEN B.INSP_ITEM_SEQ IS NULL THEN A.PRODNM ELSE B.ASSET_NAME END) AS ASSET_NAME ,B.ASSET_ENAME ,(CASE WHEN B.INSP_ITEM_SEQ IS NULL THEN CONT.CONTRDIV ELSE B.AQUSIT_TYPE_CD END) AS AQUSIT_TYPE_CD ,B.DEPRE_CD ,B.MK_NATION_CD ,B.MK_NATION_NAME ,B.MK_COMPANY_CD ,B.MK_COMPANY_NAME ,(CASE WHEN B.INSP_ITEM_SEQ IS NULL THEN SC.COMP_CD ELSE B.SL_COMPANY_CD END) AS SL_COMPANY_CD ,(CASE WHEN B.INSP_ITEM_SEQ IS NULL THEN SC.COMP_NAME ELSE B.SL_COMPANY_NAME END) AS SL_COMPANY_NAME ,(CASE WHEN B.INSP_ITEM_SEQ IS NULL THEN A.USEOFPURPOSE ELSE B.PURPOSE_OF_USE END) AS PURPOSE_OF_USE ,(CASE WHEN B.INSP_ITEM_SEQ IS NULL THEN (A.QTY * A.SPLYUCOST) ELSE B.AQUSIT_AMT END) AS AQUSIT_AMT ,(CASE WHEN B.INSP_ITEM_SEQ IS NULL THEN A.FORECURRAMT ELSE B.AQUSIT_FOREIGN_AMT END) AS AQUSIT_FOREIGN_AMT ,B.CAPI_TYPE_CD ,(CASE WHEN B.INSP_ITEM_SEQ IS NULL THEN A.SPLYUCOST ELSE B.AQUSIT_UNIT_AMT END) AS AQUSIT_UNIT_AMT ,(CASE WHEN B.INSP_ITEM_SEQ IS NULL THEN A.QTY ELSE B.ASSET_CNT END) AS ASSET_CNT ,(CASE WHEN B.INSP_ITEM_SEQ IS NULL THEN A.UNIT ELSE B.ASSET_UNIT_CD END) AS ASSET_UNIT_CD ,B.USEFUL_LIFE ,(CASE WHEN B.INSP_ITEM_SEQ IS NULL THEN A.SPEC ELSE B.ASSET_SIZE END) AS ASSET_SIZE ,(CASE WHEN B.INSP_ITEM_SEQ IS NULL THEN A.ACCNO ELSE B.ACCNT_NUM END) AS ACCNT_NUM ,IFNULL((CASE WHEN B.INSP_ITEM_SEQ IS NULL THEN A.SOFTWAREYN ELSE B.SW_YN END),'N') AS SW_YN ,B.ZEUS_YN ,B.ETUBE_YN ,B.APLCTN_RANGE_CD ,B.FD_ARTCL_NUM ,IFNULL(B.ASSET_YN,'Y') ASSET_YN ,FN_GET_CMMNCODENAME('COM006', B.AQUSIT_TYPE_CD) AQUSIT_TYPE_NAME FROM RFID_CONTRACT_DTL A INNER JOIN RFID_CONTRACT CONT ON A.PURNO = CONT.PURNO LEFT OUTER JOIN RFID_INSP_ITEM B ON A.PURNO = B.PURNO AND A.RQSTNO = B.RQSTNO AND A.PRODNO = B.PRODNO LEFT OUTER JOIN RFID_SL_COMPANY SC ON CONT.CUSTHISNO = SC.COMP_CD WHERE 1=1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RFID_CONTRACT_DTL A INNER JOIN RFID_CONTRACT CONT ON A.PURNO = CONT.PURNO LEFT OUTER JOIN RFID_INSP_ITEM B ON A.PURNO = B.PURNO AND A.RQSTNO = B.RQSTNO AND A.PRODNO = B.PRODNO LEFT OUTER JOIN RFID_SL_COMPANY SC ON CONT.CUSTHISNO = SC.COMP_CD WHERE 1=1
SELECT A.* ,(CASE WHEN A.SW_YN = 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) AS DIV_REGI_YN ,FN_GET_CMMNCODENAME('COM006', A.AQUSIT_TYPE_CD) AQUSIT_TYPE_NAME FROM RFID_INSP_ITEM A WHERE 1=1
